text: Ara tini'i se'ijana yini samudrake karechena basibhuta yena ta theke tomara khete para tataka mansa, ara ta theke bera kare anate para alankara ya tomara paro, ara tomara dekhate pa'o ora buka cire jahaja calacala kare yena tomara tamra anugrahasamagri sandhana karate para, ara yena tomara krtajnata prakasa karo.
